Package starvationevasion.client.GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clock
    Timer is the class responsible for representing the countdown timer for the two different game phases DraftingPhase has 5 minutes VotingPhase has 2 minutes
    GUI
    GUI.java is the class which holds the thread for running the main GUI of starvation evasion The GUI is responsible for drawing the game state on the screen for the user and for receiving user input The GUI displays to the user the the time remaining in the phase, the visualization, data graphs information related to food products, the user's other information relating to the draft.
    ResizablePane  
    SummaryBar
    SummaryBar is the node which is displayed at the top of the GUI.
    TestLauncher
